授業目的: In this class we will continue learning how to structure essays. We'll work on more advanced essays and focus on making our writing clear and succinct.
到達目標: Getting ready to write longer academic papers.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: All classes will be held online. There will be assignments uploaded onto LUNA every week. You will have your scheduled class time to finish the assignment and email it to me. In theory, you should use our scheduled class time; however, you may complete the assignments early if you prefer. We will not do any video chats.

トピック.授業外学習2: You will have to write two essays.

評価.教科書Required texts0: We will not use a textbook for this course. However, students will be required to download lessons from LUNA.
